title: FBI Honolulu: Feds in the 50th State
description:
Aloha. From the big island to Guam, the head of the FBI in Hawaii takes us inside the culture and cases of his vast Pacific territory.
Follow Frank on Twitter
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
